briefTitle: Safety Study of IV Peramivir in Hospitalized Subjects With Confirmed or Suspected Influenza
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, Randomized Study of the Antiviral Activity, Safety, and Tolerability of Intravenous Peramivir in Hospitalized Subjects With Confirmed or Suspected Influenza Infection
summary: This is a Phase 3, open-label, randomized study of the antiviral activity, safety, and tolerability of intravenous Peramivir in hospitalized subjects with confirmed or suspected influenza infection.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Influenza Virus Titer (48 Hours)
